 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁכַר‎</span>] **verb** ==be, or beocme, drunk, drunken== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, derived species and derivatives; [[Eccl.40.18|Eccl 40:18]]; [[Eccl.40.20|Eccl 40:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שכר‎</span> ***strong drink***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be drunken***, also ***be full***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fill***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šikaru***</u></abbr>; = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁכָר‎</span>, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šikaru***</u></abbr>, ***drunken***, perhaps also verb <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šakâru***</u></abbr>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שִׁכְרָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁכָר‎</span>, especially ***date-wine*** ([[BDB#Löw|Löw p. 125]]), compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be drunken***, usually (derived species) ***defile, deform***, etc.; from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁכָר‎</span>, Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***t-av-k-±ra***</u></abbr> [[BDB#WMM|WMM]]<sup>As.u.Eur.102</sup>, Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">σίκερα</span>, [[BDB#Lewy|Lewy]]<sup>Fremdw. 81</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָֽׁכְרוּ‎</span> [[Isa.29.9|Isa 29:9]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁכָּ֑ר‎</span>[[Gen.9.21|Gen 9:21]], 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁכָּר֑וּן‎</span> [[Isa.49.26|Isa 49:26]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁכְרוּ‎</span> [[Jer.25.27|Jer 25:27]]; [[Song.5.1|Song 5:1]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשָׁכְרָה‎</span> [[Hag.1.6|Hag 1:6]] ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁכֻרַת‎</span>[[Isa.51.21|Isa 51:21]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:130b»§ 130b</sup> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 60</sup>); — ***become drunken*** [[Gen.9.21|Gen 9:21]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), of social drinking [[Gen.43.34|Gen 43:34]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Song.5.1|Song 5:1]], token of plenty [[Hag.1.6|Hag 1:6]] figurative of nations staggering helplessly under calamity [[Jer.25.27|Jer 25:27]]; [[Jer.51.21|Jer 51:21]](<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְלֹא מִיָּ֑יִן‎</span>), of [[Nah.3.11|Nah 3:11]] of infatuation [[Isa.29.9|Isa 29:9]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְלֹא יַיִן‎</span>), of disgrace [[Lam.4.21|Lam 4:21]], self-destruction, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּעָסִיס דָּמָם יִשׁ‎</span> [[Isa.49.26|Isa 49:26]]. **Pi\`el** ***make drunken: Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְשַׁכְּרֵהוּ‎</span> [[2Sam.11.13|2Sam 11:13]], literal; figurative 1 singular (suffix of people) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַאֲשַׁכְּרֵם‎</span> (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָ‎</span>) [[Isa.63.6|Isa 63:6]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) ***I made them drunk*** in my wrath (but [[BDB#MSS|MSS]] [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]] and others <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאֲשַׁבְּרֵם‎</span> ***I brake them in pieces***); ***Participle*** feminine singular, of Babylonian, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׁכֶּרֶת בָּלהָֿרֶץ‎</span> [[Jer.51.7|Jer 51:7]] compare ***Infinitive abs***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁכֵּר‎</span> [[Hab.2.15|Hab 2:15]] (i. e. terrorizing nations; read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁקֵה וְאַף שׁ‎</span> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]). **Hiph\`il** ***id.: Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִשְׁכַּרְתִּ֫י‎</span> [[Jer.51.27|Jer 51:27]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) i.e. make princes helpless, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִשְׁכַּרְתִּים‎</span> v[[Jer.51.39|Jer 51:39]] ***Imperative*** masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁכִּירֻהוּ‎</span> object Moab, i.e. make helpless and disgraced [[Jer.48.26|Jer 48:26]] ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַשְׁכִּיר חְצַּי מִדָּם‎</span> [[Deut.32.42|Deut 32:42]]. — Ruben<sup>JQ xi (1889), 446</sup> proposes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׁכִּירוֺת‎</span> [[Hos.7.5|Hos 7:5]] for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משׁך ידו את‎</span>. **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׁתַּכָּרִין‎</span> [[1Sam.1.14|1Sam 1:14]] how long ***wilt thou make thyself drunken*** [a drunken spectacle] ?
